subject: [PATCH-RFC] btrfs: for unclustered allocation don't consider ffe_ctl->empty_cluster

reviews.author: Boris Burkov
reviews.summary: Acknowledged the potential bug and suggested revising the approach to clearly define relationships between variables.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: Patch author's original patch aimed to modify btrfs allocation logic for unclustered scenarios, but a reviewer pointed out the missing RFC tag and suggested revising the approach.
